summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4867 for the improvement of the alley in Block 20, Law's Addition, being the alley between 18th Avenue North and 19th Avenue North, from East Harrison Street to East Republican Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55908, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
